post.description: This route adds the iOS application's associated domain configuration for a vendor. Send values in the POST body for params that you want to add or update. See the dropdown for available values for each param.

get.description: This route gets the iOS application's associated domain configuration for a vendor.

delete.description: This route deletes the iOS application's associated domain configuration for a vendor. Send values in the POST body for params that you want to add or update. See the dropdown for available values for each param.
